title: 'Product quality is good but wrong specs'
body: 'I have two products of the same item... One size full Another recently purchased twin size  The full size showed the size of the product as 90 x 90 inches  And the twin size is shown is 60 x 90 inches....  However the size is much smaller than stated.... The twin size when measured is 60 x 79 inches.....  Also in the product description page the difference in size between the two sizes was shown as 2-3 cms.. This is grossly misleading and Amazon should rectify it so that customers could make the right and conscious choice while making the purchase.'

title: 'Not a bad blanket for one person'

title: 'Soft and cozy blanket for mild winters'
body: 'I moved to a new place earlier this year and ordered this blanket after the night temperatures at my place in Punjab started going down to 20 degrees celsius. It just fits the bill. Important points to keep the review short- 1. This is a blanket for mild winters. Like those of November and February in North India. 2. The blanket is light-weight
column6: and cozy. 3. The fabric is not allergic. I was never able to use a blanket without a cotton cover but I am comfortable with these even without a cover. 4. The fabric quality is premium and it feels that the blanket will last for long. 5. The look is elegant. I mean really elegant. 6. The only con is that the length of the blanket is a bit shorter than market standard. If your height is more than 5 feet 10 inches
column7: this blanket is not for you.'
